{"name": "Salvation Army Northwest Ohio Area Services", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Required: Photo ID for all household residents
(age 19 and over), proof of household income within
the last 30 days, proof of address within the last
30 days (unless client is declaring homeless status),
Birth certificates or JFS printout for proof
of minor children", "email": "", "url": null, "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "620 North Erie Street", "address_2": null, "city": "Center City", "state_province": "OH", "postal_code": "43604", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 41.6571825, "longitude": -83.5333692}, "phones": [{"number": "(419) 241-3549", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "17:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "17:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}]}
